Address.title: Address

id.description: The System ID of the Address

country.description: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

region.description: The region in which the locality is. For example, California or another appropriate first-level Administrative division.

addressType.description: This is where the user can specify the type of the address for example Home, Work, etc.

streetAddress.description: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.

locality.description: The locality in which the address is located. For example, Mountain View.

poBox.description: The post office box number for PO box addresses.

Address.description: This class represents an address and is modeled after Postal address from schema.org PostalAddress

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: This is the main model object Contact that is managed by our service. It is meant to provide an localized way of keeping track of contacts as not all cultures have first and last name as the way they identify people. To see more take a look at the W3C recommendation Personal names around the world

tags.name: User
tags.description: User is anyone who is managing a Contact in our service
